rukus.text: Mi ya saharaci sapatha gheto
Ani tumhi ya saharata vastavya karata
Ani (sapatha ahe) manavi pita ani santatici
Nihsansaya, amhi manavala (mothya) kasta-yataneta nirmana kele
Kaya manusya ase samajato ki to konacya niyantranakhali nahi
Sangata (phirato) ki mi tara bharapura dhana-sampatti kharca karuna takali
Kaya, to (ase) samajato ki koni tyala pahileca nahi
Kaya, amhi tyace dona dole nahi banavile
Ani eka jibha va dona otha (nahi banavile)
Ani tyala donhi marga dakhavuna dile
Tevha, ghatita pravesa karane tyala sakya jhale nahi
Tumhala kaya mahita ki to ghati marga kaya ahe
Ekhadyaci mana (dasa, dasi) mukta karane
Kinva bhukelya divasi potabhara jevu ghalane
Ekhadya nateva'ika anathala
Kinva matisa milalelya atisaya gariba manasala
Maga tya lokampaiki jhala asata, je imana rakhatata, ani ekamekanna dhira sanyama va daya karuna karanyaci takida karatata
Heca loka aheta ujavya bajuce
Ani jya lokanni amacya ayatinca inkara kela, teca loka davya hatace aheta
Heca agicya kondita asatila ji cari bajunni gheraleli asela
